name: Being Good Enough?
description: A training module to help you understand the importance of being good enough.

lessons.speaker: a
lessons.message: Hey! I'm kind of nervous, but also excited to see how we did on the exam.

lessons.speaker: b
lessons.message: Alright everyone, here are your results. Hope you’re proud of the effort you put in.

lessons.speaker: c
lessons.message: You scored 60%. How are you feeling about that?

lessons.speaker: a
lessons.message: Your best friend got 95%. They’re always topping the class. Honestly, it feels like we’ll never be that good. They just seem naturally smart, and we’re... not.

lessons.speaker: c
lessons.message: Hold on—before you decide your potential and worth, it's important to ask yourself a question: Did you honestly prepare hard enough with focus for the exam?
